title: Future for the Chiefs & 49ers, Could Kansas City be starting a dynasty? (Football 2/5)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by Brady Quinn and Jonathan Jones to dissect the future for this year's Super Bowl teams, the Chiefs and 49ers. The guys discuss the inevitable contract extension for Patrick Mahomes and whether that will come this season or next (6:05), the possibility of Kansas City creating a dynasty (17:45) and what they need to address this offseason (24:45). Then, it's San Francisco's turn (33:45). Could they seriously consider cutting ties with Jimmy Garoppolo? The Niners have free agency and draft concerns of their own that have to be addressed to get back to the Super Bowl. Next, Will and Brady discuss excitement for the XFL (43:45), the Jaguars playing back-to-back home games in London next season (51:30) and Greg Olsen's future in the league (56:30). Finally, a recap of last week's Bud Light Music Fest in Miami (59:00).
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy

itunes:subtitle: Who is more likely to get back to Super Bowl 55? The Pick Six podcast dissects the future for this year's Super Bowl teams.
